stanza.line: My love is strengthened though more weak in seemingseeming
I love not less though less the show appearappear
That love is merchandized whose rich esteemingesteeming
The owner tongue doth publish every wherewhere
Our love was new and then but in the springspring
When I was wont to greet it with my layslays
As Philomel in summer front doth singsing
And stops her pipe in growth of riper daysdays
Not that the summer is less pleasant nownow
Than when her mournful hymns did hush the nightnight
But that wild music burthens every boughbough
And sweets grown common lose their dear delightdelight
Therefore like her I sometime hold my tonguetongue
Because I would not dull you with my songsong
